name: Project ION
description:
Project ION is a game where you play as Ion and traverse through a series of devious puzzles to reach Project Gear and rebel against your intended deletion.

Credits:

  • Developers:
    • Liam Kochanek
    • Howard Yang
    • Brandon Low
    • Jun Ryul Choi
  • Composer:
    • Krishen Ratnayaka

NOTE: There's a patched version with a more difficult version of a level available. Other than that, they are equivalent.
